name: Pink Pastel Light Mini
description: Simple Pink Palette for people who like cute things.
additional_info:
GoodTwitter 2 is REQUIRED for this to work.

This relies entirely on classic Twitter color variables and it will not work on the new Twitter layout if you do not have GoodTwitter 2 installed. Your display settings must also be set to Light mode with Red as your accent color, since Twitter overwrites some colors and simple variable changes won't fix that. I plan to make a full on version of this over at my github page BonkmaykrQ eventually that will work around this but it will probably not be posted here.
